challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: In the summer it will be warm.

challenges.meaning: In the summer it will be warm.

challenges.formattedSolution: V lete bude teplo.
In the summer it will be warm.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Na jeseň budeme vidieť padať lístie.

In spring, flowers grow.

challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: In the summer, there is a lot of sun.

challenges.formattedSolution: V lete je veľa slnka.

challenges.meaning: The air in winter will be cold.

challenges.formattedSolution: Vzduch v zime bude chladný.
